steps.title: Search for watermarks in {{FileformatCap}} files using {{EnvName}}

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** makes it easy to search for watermarks already placed in business documents. Download our package and involve it into your {{EnvName}} application to take advantage of its benefits.
content.step_1: In order to use our library features you need to load {{FileformatCap}} file to the **Watermarker** class instance. It is possible to provide just a file path, file stream or a byte stream.
content.step_2: To narrow list of possible watermarks use **SearchCriteria** object. Provide image as an example to get similar image watermark. If you want to search for textual watermark provide text, font, color and other options.
content.step_3: To get watermarks placed in the document use method **Search** of the **Watermarker** object. You will be provided with collection of objects which may be processed as watermarks.
content.step_4: Finally, you are free to do with result of search whatever you want. It is completely possible, to delete found watermarks or edit their properties. Change size or text, for example.

more_features.title: Deep dive into adding Watermark
more_features.description: API to render, display, convert documents, slides, diagrams, and many other document types in .NET applications

feature_1.title: Watermark your documents easily.
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to add various types of watermarks in popular business documents and files.

feature_2.title: Customize watermarks for your goals.
feature_2.content: Our solution supports many watermark features. You can easily adjust size, rotation, color, font, font styles and other options to make watermark looks perfect.

feature_3.title: Use native document objects
feature_3.content: Accordingly do particular document format it is possible to use native document features. Native PDF annotations or MS Word page watermark may be used for watermarking.

code_1.title: Combined search
code_1.content: This example shows how to search watermark with the combination of different search criteria.

head.title: Explore {{FileformatCap}} Spreadsheets Watermarks Search
head.description: Discover how {{ProdFullName}} empowers you to effortlessly search, find, and manage watermarks in various document formats.

header.title: Unveiling {{FileformatCap}} Spreadsheets Watermarks Search Capabilities
header.description: Delve into the power of {{ProdFullName}} to search, edit, and manipulate watermarks with ease.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Base {{ProdFullName}} Information
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is a comprehensive solution for managing {{FileformatCap}} watermarks using {{EnvName}}. With this tool, developers can easily perform operations such as create, edit, search, and remove watermarks from documents in popular file formats. It supports working with both text and image watermarks in a variety of documents, including PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, email, and image formats. {{ProdFullName}} supports all major operating systems and {{EnvName}} versions.

formats.description: Empower yourself to find and manage watermarks in various supported file formats with {{ProdFullName}}.
